revised_title: The Propagation of Misselto: Insights into the Growth and Sowing of the Plant
tldr: The author, Edmond Barrel, shares his observations and experiments on the propagation of the misselto plant. He explains the process of germination and growth, as well as the challenges faced in sowing the seeds. Barrel also discusses the historical perspectives on misselto's growth and the role of birds in spreading its seeds.
